content:
# The error indicates that I cannot insert the iron plate into the stone furnace because it is already processing iron ore. 
# I need to wait for the stone furnace to finish smelting the iron ore before I can use it for any other purpose.

# Since I have already inserted the remaining 7 iron ore into the furnace, I should wait for that process to complete.
# I will monitor the furnace status for a short period to see how many iron plates are produced.

# Let's wait for the smelting process to complete, checking every second.
for _ in range(30):  # Maximum 30 seconds wait.
    current_inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)
    if current_inventory.get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0) > 0:
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")

# After smelting, I will check the final inventory of the furnace and my own inventory to see what has been produced.
print(f"Final Entities: {get_entities()}")
print(f"Inventory after smelting: {inspect_inventory()}")
